color_system.strategy: High visibility accents against structural neutrals. Think 'Safety Orange' and 'Steel Beam' on 'Concrete'.

semantic_usage.accent: Call to Actions (RFQs), Urgent Alerts, 'Safety' highlights
semantic_usage.muted: Backgrounds for secondary areas, inactive tabs
semantic_usage.border: Hard structural lines defining the grid

rules: Headings must use Manrope. It feels engineered.
Data tables must use Public Sans for numbers for readability.
SKUs and Reference IDs must use JetBrains Mono.
Never center text unless it is a standalone metric.
Use explicit borders to define space, not just whitespace.
Dashboard widgets must align perfectly to the grid.
Forms should be narrow and focused (max-w-2xl) to avoid eye-travel fatigue.

buttons.style: Sharp or slightly rounded (rounded-md). No pill shapes.

cards.style: Flat, bordered, minimal shadow. rounded-lg border-slate-200 shadow-sm

tables.style: Dense, distinct header. Header bg-slate-50 border-b border-slate-200. Font-mono for IDs.

forms.input: bg-white border-slate-300 focus:ring-2 focus:ring-slate-400 focus:border-slate-400 rounded-md
forms.label: text-sm font-medium text-slate-700 mb-1.5 block

auth_background.alt: Orange tower crane against blue sky

instructions: Use Shadcn components as the base but override rounded-xl with rounded-lg or rounded-md.
Use Recharts ResponsiveContainer for all charts.
Implement server-side pagination for all tables using TanStack Table (if available) or manual state.

universal_guidelines: NO gradients on buttons. Flat colors only.
NO blurry drop shadows. Use crisp borders.
Data density is a feature. Do not use excessive whitespace in tables.
Status badges must use subtle backgrounds (bg-blue-100 text-blue-800) not solid blocks.
Interactive elements must have a data-testid attribute.

instructions_to_main_agent.step_1: Update globals.css (or index.css) with the HSL color values provided in color_system.
instructions_to_main_agent.step_2: Install fonts: Manrope and Public Sans via Google Fonts (import in index.css).
instructions_to_main_agent.step_3: Create a Layout component that implements the Sidebar + Header structure.
instructions_to_main_agent.step_4: Build the Dashboard using the 'Blueprint Grid' strategy.
instructions_to_main_agent.step_5: When building tables, ensure columns have fixed widths where possible to prevent jumping.
